title: Mudassar Baig
text:
Mudassar Baig (born 17 April 1979, in <a href="Faisalabad">Faisalabad</a>) is a Pakistani para-athlete.
Background.
Baig was crippled after he fractured his leg playing <a href="association%20football">football</a> in school and the doctor treating him botched his treatment. He is married with one daughter. He is employed by <a href="Pakistan%20Post">Pakistan Post</a> in his home town.
